name: Tortoise Island (Knitwit Studios)
description:
Made for Quad Jam 1, where the theme was "Don't Let Anyone Die".

Thought it would be fun to do this with turtles falling from balloons. Then about 3 days into the jam... realized turtles are great swimmers,  so switched it to tortoises.

Controls
  • Left-Click: Shoot bow
  • Right-Click: Menu mode
  • Move mouse: Aim
Credits
  • Azivar - 3D Models, Textures, and Materials
  • Clang - Programming and Design
  • zapsplat.com - All royalty-free sound effects
